definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Is a warm sub-humid continental climate.
sentences.chinese: 屬暖溫帶半溼潤大陸性氣候。

sentences.english: Along the Yangtze River is a typical continental climate, the winter cold, summer warmth.
sentences.chinese: 沿江爲典型的大陸性氣候，冬季寒冷，夏季溫暖。

sentences.english: Henan has a temperate continental climate, with most rainfall in summer.
sentences.chinese: 河南省屬於溫帶大陸性氣候，夏季多雨。

sentences.english: The Hunshandake sand land located in the warm temperate zone which is continental monsoon climate area.
sentences.chinese: 渾善達克沙地屬中溫帶半乾旱大陸性季風氣候區。

sentences.english: The northeastern United States coast is a continental climate temperate forest.
sentences.chinese: 美國東北部沿海屬大陸性溫帶闊葉林氣候。

sentences.english: Therefore, said Mira Hill is a continental climate with the climate of the watershed.
sentences.chinese: 因此說，米拉山是大陸性氣候與海洋性氣候的分水嶺。

sentences.english: Belong to the coastal sub-humid warm temperate continental monsoon climate, four distinct seasons.
sentences.chinese: 屬於暖溫帶濱海半溼潤大陸性季風氣候，四季分明。
這裏是典型的大陸性氣候。

sentences.english: Therefore , said Mira Hill is a continental climate with the climate of the watershed . bbs. ifeng…
sentences.chinese: 因此說，米拉山是大陸性氣候與海洋性氣候的分水嶺。

sentences.english: Zhengzhou has a temperate and monsoonal climate with four clearly distinct seasons.
sentences.chinese: 鄭州地區屬暖溫帶大陸性氣候，四季分明。

sentences.english: Far from the sea is an inland continental climate.
sentences.chinese: 離海遠的內陸屬大陸性氣候。

sentences.english: A humid continental climate is found in the north-eastern part of the country.
sentences.chinese: 美國東北部爲溼潤的大陸性氣候。

sentences.english: Yangqu located in warm temperate latitudes in the northern hemisphere, is a continental climate.
sentences.chinese: 陽曲位於北半球中緯度暖溫帶，屬大陸性氣候。

sentences.english: Jinzhong a warm temperate continental monsoon climate, seasonal changes.
sentences.chinese: 晉中屬暖溫帶大陸性季風氣候，季節變化明顯。

sentences.english: Its climate belongs to the warm temperate zone.
sentences.chinese: 屬於暖溫帶大陸性氣候，一年四季分明。

sentences.english: There is a continental climate in that place.
sentences.chinese: 在那個地方是大陸性氣候。
